caption.p: a) XRD results of the obtained 3D Li–B–Mg composite. b) Voltage profile of the electrochemical Li stripping from the composite anode to 1 V versus Li +/Li. c) The corresponding XRD patterns and d) SEM images of the composite at specific stages marked in (b). e) Study of the structural stability of the 3D Li–B–Mg composite at high temperature. f) Calculations of adsorption energies of a Li atom on the surface of LiB, Mg, and LiB/Mg.
